LanguageData.RT_PantherG_Vehicle.label: Panther G
LanguageData.RT_PantherG_Vehicle.description:
A well-known metal beast with thick armor and a heavy cannon, works well in combat but hard to maintance.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x3, MG Gunner x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel

<color=#b0e0e6>CE Ammo:</color> 
120mm(Main cannon)
7.62x51mm(Hull and Coaxial MG)
